about_the_game:
A 3rd person action adventure game set in a parallel universe.

Side by side with us, invisibly live dark creatures. Vampires, zombies, demons and other creatures are very dangerous and always hungry. They have learnt to hide from the Guardians, who have been finding and exterminating bloodthirsty creatures for hundreds of years.

Max Soul is a cold-blooded Guardian, capable of destroying any monster in his path. His whole life is an endless hunt, and his next assignment is to identify the monster and eliminate it.

But is everything so unambiguous? Is there really only good and evil?

The player will have to get into the role of Max, dive headfirst into the hunt and understand the soul of the protagonist.

Project Features:

- Conducting an investigation and determining the type of monsters to choose how to destroy them.

- Dramatic plot with a complicated, grey morality.

- Voice control mechanics using a microphone.
